message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn to be nice.  I'll take a little less than half.
Meet me in the middle, 58-42 is a fair compromise!
The clock is ticking! This is a good deal for both of us.
Come on, Bob! 56-44 is a great compromise. Don't let the clock tick away our chance at a good deal!
Okay, Alice, let's be real. The value for you keeps dropping. Take this deal before it gets even worse!
